mapper.sql: SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENGINEOBJECT, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.TSSDENGINEID, t1.TSSDENGINENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDENGINE t1

SELECT t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`ENGINEOBJECT`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`TSSDENGINEID`, t1.`TSSDENGINENAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_TSSDENGINE` t1
SELECT t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.ENGINEOBJECT, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.TSSDENGINEID, t1.TSSDENGINENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDENGINE t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENGINEOBJECT AS ENGINEOBJECT, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.TSSDENGINEID AS TSSDENGINEID, t1.TSSDENGINENAME AS TSSDENGINENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDENGINE t1

SELECT t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.ENGINEOBJECT AS ENGINEOBJECT, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.TSSDENGINEID AS TSSDENGINEID, t1.TSSDENGINENAME AS TSSDENGINENAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFTSSDENGINE t1

SELECT t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[ENGINEOBJECT], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[TSSDENGINEID], t1.[TSSDENGINENAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFTSSDENGINE] t1
